DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy safety Luxe™ device use wrinkle rosacea treatment . Up 60 subject treat periorbital cheek area daily 4 week twice week additional 4 week . Evaluations improvement conduct clinic enrollment treatment 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 week initiation .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Luxe Device Treat Facial Wrinkles Rosacea
